Create a "smart" bread loaf that uses augmented reality to display information about the ingredients and nutritional value of the bread.
Develop a bread loaf that has a built-in speaker and plays a tune or a sound effect when sliced.
Create a bread loaf that can be customized with different textures and flavors using a 3D printer.
Develop a bread loaf that is infused with essential oils to promote relaxation and stress relief.
Create a bread loaf that is made entirely of edible ingredients and can be molded into different shapes, such as animals or characters.
